## diary init

Initialize directory

### Synopsis

Init command make template directory.
You need to run this command before running other command.


```
diary init [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --dir string   Created template directory path (default ".")
  -h, --help         help for init
      --v            Output verbose.
```
